title: The next golden era of space exploration
description: The new space race doesn’t just pit nation-states against one another, it’s also a fight between private companies looking to cash in. Chuck talks with Michio Kaku, theoretical physicist and professor at the City University of New York and the author of “The God Equation: The Quest for a Theory of Everything.”
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
